title: SET_VEHICLE_NUMBER_PLATE_TEXT_INDEX
content:
0x9088EB5A43FFB0A10xA1A1890E// SetVehicleNumberPlateTextIndex
void SET_VEHICLE_NUMBER_PLATE_TEXT_INDEX(Vehicle vehicle, int plateIndex);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle handle.plateIndex: The style to use for the plate, see plate styles.Please refer to GET_VEHICLE_NUMBER_PLATE_TEXT_INDEX for plate indicies.
